alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Monroe; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 8:20PM CDT until August 11 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LA CROSSE...NORTHWESTERN VERNON AND SOUTHWESTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 819 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Cashton to near Stoddard, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. A 60 mph wind gust was measured at La Crosse shortly before 8:00 pm. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Cashton around 825 PM CDT. Westby around 830 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include County Roads G And H, Brinkman Ridge, Jersey Valley County Park, Portland, Esofea, Highways 14 61 And County M M and Spring Ridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
